name: 2 for 2048
description:
2 for 2048 requires users to master simple counting ability. You should connect the same numbers without a pause medially, and make lines by connecting as many same numbers as you can, they will be added up in multiples of 2. The game is over when there is no available numbers can be connected. The more numbers connected, the more points you get and the longer you’ll survive.

No limited time and free to play, let’s start connecting and getting high scores!
